Description: An apricot aroma and a strong buttery flavor give this wine a lot of personality. The butterscotch and ripe fruit notes are coated in a rich, mouthfilling texture despite low alcohol.                      Jim Gordon
Name: 101 North NV Pinot Grigio (California)

Appellation: Santa Cruz Mountains, Central Coast, California, US
Description: Clean and snappy aromas of crystallized citrus and pome fruits are sharp but forgiving on the nose of this barrel-fermented bottling, which also offers a hint of honey dust. The palate shows green-pear and tight apricot flavors, wrapped in a grippy texture and washed by refreshing acidity.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Bargetto 2019 Regan Vineyard Pinot Grigio (Santa Cruz Mountains)

Description: Nectarine, lime-pith, lemon-blossom and pink-fleshed-fruit aromas show on the nose of this bottling, which exhibits the slightest shade of pink in the glass. Yellow-apple-skin flavors pop on the soft palate.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Estancia 2019 Pinot Grigio (California)

Appellation: North Fork of Long Island, Long Island, New York, US
Description: This bright, fruity wine is driven by banana, pineapple, pear and apple on the nose. There's a gentle creaminess to the palate, where the orchard fruit flavors are demure and are lifted by a mild vein on acidity.                      Alexander Peartree
Designation: Small Batch Series Corey Creek Vineyard
Name: Bedell 2019 Small Batch Series Corey Creek Vineyard Pinot Grigio (North Fork of Long Island)

Appellation: Finger Lakes, Finger Lakes, New York, US
Description: Aromas of juiced pear and a hint of warm spice lead to the juicy palate. The flavors are a bit muted, but what's there is nice.                      Alexander Peartree
Name: Penguin Bay 2019 Pinot Grigio (Finger Lakes)

Appellation: Columbia Valley (WA), Columbia Valley, Washington, US
Description: The aromas are light but bring some complexity, with notes of apple, pear and the underside of pineapple. Mouthwatering citrus and pear flavors follow. Dried flower notes linger on the finish.                      Sean P. Sullivan
Name: Bieler Family 2019 Daisy Pinot Grigio (Columbia Valley (WA))

Description: Quite light in the glass, this simple but pleasant bottling offers light aromas of apple blossom, honeydew and a steel minerality. Riper apple-flesh flavors show on the palate as does a touch of light lime juice.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Summerland 2019 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: A hint of pink in the color and unusually ripe, floral flavors help this medium-bodied wine stand out. It's mouthfilling, smooth and full of peach and plums flavors.                      Jim Gordon
Name: The Girls in the Vineyard 2019 Pinot Grigio (Mendocino)

Description: This medium-bodied wine tastes clean, fresh and mildly fruity, offering honeydew melon aromas, jicama flavors and a rather soft texture.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Barefoot NV Pinot Grigio (America)

Description: Nearly neutral in flavor, this medium-bodied wine is rounded in texture and generally ripe tasting, with a good nip of acidity for balance.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Insomnia NV Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: Aromas of dried meat and honeysuckle lead to light, crisp peach and melon flavors in this medium-bodied wine.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Gnarly Head 2019 Pinot Grigio (Lodi)

Appellation: River Junction, Central Valley, California, US
Description: This light-bodied wine offers fruity aromas of honeydew melons and straightforward flavors on a light texture.                      Jim Gordon
Name: McManis 2019 Estate Grown Pinot Grigio (River Junction)

Description: This straightforward, medium-bodied wine offers basic melon and peach flavors and a sense of sweetness on the finish.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Trinity Oaks 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: Aromas of pears and peaches give way to banana flavors and a soft texture in this medium-bodied wine.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Brownstone NV Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: This light-bodied, innocuous wine is very neutral in flavor, giving only a hint of cucumber. It's clean and gulpable.                      Jim Gordon
Name: PaintBox NV Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: White spring-flower and white stone-fruit aromas lead the nose on this tangy white. On the refreshing palate, crisp acidity accompanies yellow apple and apricot before finishing on a lime note.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Stemmari 2019 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)

Description: This wine has more flavor than many of its competitors, boasting bright peach and ripe melon in the aroma and satisfying white peach on the palate. It's medium bodied and mouthfilling.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Bota Box 2019 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: Lively and well-concentrated, too, this medium-bodied wine has good acidity to make it appetizing and plenty of tasty green-apple, white-peach and apricot flavors to savor.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Sand Point 2019 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: A rich texture makes this wine more mouthfilling and expansive than many. It boasts tasty, seemingly sweet honeydew-melon and peach flavors.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Bucket List NV Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: This light-bodied wine could pass for a Riesling, with its not unpleasant petrol aroma and lean peach and apricot flavors.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Mirassou Sun 2019 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: This fruit bowl of a wine is packed with apples, peaches and melons on a smooth, soft texture that brings a sensation of sweetness on the finish.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Winemakers Selection 2019 Pinot Grigio (California)

Appellation: Paso Robles, Central Coast, California, US
Description: Light herbs and dried grass show on the nose of this bottling. The palate is somewhat flat in texture but delivers acceptable flavors of Granny Smith apples and more dried grass.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Tree Fort 2019 Pinot Grigio (Paso Robles)

Description: This light-bodied wine is refreshing and clean but almost neutral in flavor, offering faint lemon and cucumber notes.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Sterling 2018 Vintner's Collection Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: Lively green-apple aromas meet heavier flavors and a thick texture in this full-bodied wine.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Terra d'Oro 2019 Pinot Grigio (Clarksburg)

Appellation: Santa Barbara County, Central Coast, California, US
Description: Very light in the glass, this crisp and clean bottling begins with aromas of soft red apple, fat white-gardenia flower buds and a light tone of nectarine. The palate is both tight and expressive, as a firm texture delivers flavors of Asian pear, grippy tangerine skin and a touch of honeysuckle.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Brevity 2019 Pinot Grigio (Santa Barbara County)

Description: White stone-fruit and citrus-blossom aromas emerge from the glass. The lively palate offers Bartlett pear, Meyer lemon and a ginger note alongside fresh acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Feudo Arancio 2019 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)

Description: Nicely concentrated, crisp fruit flavors give this medium-bodied wine a lot to like. Tangy white-peach and Pippin apple flavors are lightly accented by lemon, adding to the vibrant mouthfeel.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Dark Horse 2019 Pinot Grigio (California)

Appellation: Columbia Valley (WA), Columbia Valley, Washington, US
Description: The aromas are light, with notes of freshly cut yellow apple and pear followed by sleek, pleasing, fruit forward flavors that bring a bright sense of acidity. Acid and freshness are the drivers. Pair it with scallop ceviche with generous amounts of lime.                      Sean P. Sullivan
Name: Cavatappi 2019 Pinot Grigio (Columbia Valley (WA))

Appellation: Central Coast, Central Coast, California, US
Description: Aromas of guava and honeydew carry the fresh nose of this widely available bottling. There is a pleasing grip to the sip, where guava peel, Asian pear and cherimoya flavors meet with a hint of wet stone.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: SeaGlass 2019 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)

Appellation: San Benito, Central Coast, California, US
Description: Tangy aromas of orange and lime rind meet with warm hints of freshly cut pear on the likable nose of this bottling. The palate is rounded with honeydew and white-melon flavors, made more complex by wet rock elements. It is incredibly easy to drink.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Swanson 2019 Pinot Grigio (San Benito)

Appellation: Livermore Valley, Central Coast, California, US
Description: This unusual wine appears as a light-copper-colored ros√©, showing the true color of the Pinot Gris grape skins. It's full of prosciutto and melon flavors, has a rather full body and a hint of tangy acidity for good balance.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Longevity 2019 Vintner Select Pinot Grigio (Livermore Valley)

Appellation: Fair Play, Sierra Foothills, California, US
Description: Quite rich and concentrated, this ripe and peachy-tasting wine offers a mouthfilling full body and ample fruit flavors.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Oakstone 2019 Lemley Ranch Pinot Grigio (Fair Play)

Description: This is a straightforward, crisp and clean wine with good acidity and mild fruit flavors. It's light bodied and refreshing, good for everyday occasions.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Bogle 2018 Pinot Grigio (Clarksburg)

Description: This ripe and mouthfilling wine shows a soft fruitiness, a nicely full body and laid-back pear flavors.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Three Thieves 2019 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: A slightly smoky, petrol aroma and lip-smacking apricot flavors help this light-bodied wine stand out. It's a bit earthy and unorthodox but fun to drink.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Josh Cellars 2019 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: Classic varietal aromas of crushed tomato vine, exotic fruit and wild herb almost jump out of the glass. On the vibrant, savory palate, tangy acidity underscores pineapple, grapefruit and green melon, while an energizing mineral note evoking saline lingers on the finish.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Venica & Venica 2019 Ronco del Cer√≤ Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Aromas of Alpine herb, white spring flower and ripe orchard fruit mingle together in the glass. Tangy and rounded, the savory palate boasts intense flavor and finesse, doling out ripe yellow pear, white peach and a hint of green melon alongside fresh acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Jermann 2019 Pinot Grigio (Friuli)

Description: This copper-colored wine has a perfumed nose evoking spring wildflowers and white stone fruit with whiffs of wild herb. The savory palate features juicy peach, white cherry and ginger notes alongside tangy acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Venica & Venica 2019 Jesera Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Aromas evoking hawthorn and cantaloupe mingle with scents of Alpine herb on this savory, structured Pinot Grigio. On the rounded palate, fresh acidity lifts mature pear, Rennet apple and a hint of nectarine. It closes on a saline note.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Schiopetto 2018 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Aromas of elderflower and green melon lead the nose along with a hint of hay. On the medium-bodied palate, a note of honeyed almond accompanies mature pear and ripe apple. Tangy acidity lifts the finish.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Ferruccio Sgubin 2018 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Lightly scented, this vibrant white offers delicate aromas of white stone fruit and spring wildflowers. It's racy and chiseled, featuring apple, pear and ginger flavors before a crisp, mineral finish.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Gradis'ciutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Beeswax, fresh pollen and white stone fruit aromas waft out of the glass. The tangy, polished palate offers mature Bartlett pear, yellow apple and citrus drop candy before an almond close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: La Rajade 2018 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Beeswax, fresh pollen and white stone fruit aromas waft out of the glass. The tangy, polished palate offers mature Bartlett pear, yellow apple and citrus drop candy before an almond close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: La Rajade 2018 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Spring blossom and summer orchard fruit aromas are front and center. On the savory, linear palate, tangy acidity accompanies Bartlett pear, Granny Smith apple and white peach before a white almond close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Villa Russiz 2018 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Aromas of spring blossoms waft out of the glass. Bright and savory, the palate doles out ripe Bartlett pear, lemon drop candy and an inviting hint of bread dough alongside tangy acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Borgo Conventi 2018 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Aromas of white stone fruit and chamomile shape the nose along with a yeasty whiff of bread crust. On the racy palate, crisp acidity accompanies mature pear, white cherry and a dollop of vanilla before an almond close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Castello di Spessa 2018 Joy Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Tangy and delicious, this vibrant white opens with delicate scents of spring blossoms and white stone fruit. On the crisp palate, fresh acidity accompanies green apple, white peach and fennel.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Kettmeir 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Spring blossom, ripe orchard fruit and botanical herb aromas form the inviting nose. Round and medium bodied, the dry palate shows Bartlett pear, apple and a hint of white almond accompanied by tangy acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Vigna del Lauro 2019 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Spring blossom, ripe orchard fruit and botanical herb aromas form the inviting nose. Round and medium bodied, the dry palate shows Bartlett pear, apple and a hint of white almond accompanied by tangy acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Vigna del Lauro 2019 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Ripe white stone fruit and spring blossom aromas waft out of the glass on this medium-bodied white along with a whiff of sea breeze. The vibrant palate offers ripe pear, saline and white almond alongside tangy acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Ronco Blanchis 2019 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: White spring blossoms and Granny Smith apple waft out of the glass along with an inviting, subtle whiff evoking bread dough. Bright and savory, the medium-bodied palate shows Bartlett pear, green melon and citrus zest alongside tangy acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Sturm 2019 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: This has subtle aromas suggesting spring blossoms and orchard fruit. On the medium-bodied palate, tangy acidity accompanies honeydew and green apple before a bitter almond close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Primosic 2019 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Made with organically farmed grapes and packaged in an extremely heavy bottle, this has aromas of tropical fruit and green apple. On the racy, rather lean palate, crisp acidity accompanies suggestions of green melon, Granny Smith apple and a hint of citrus.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Monte Zovo 2019 Wolhlgemuth Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: Aromas of banana and Granny Smith apple follow over the palate along with ripe honeydew. Bright acidity keeps it fresh and tangy.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Cantina Produttori di Cormons 2019 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Delicate scents of spring wildflowers, white stone fruit and a hint of nut form the subtle nose. On the palate, bright acidity accompanies pear, candied tangerine slice and bitter almond.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Tenuta di Angoris 2018 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Subtle aromas evoking beeswax and spring flowers form the delicate nose. On the linear palate, bright acidity accompanies mature yellow pear and a savory, saline-like mineral note.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Pighin 2019 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: This has a shy nose that eventually offers mere whiffs of yellow wildflowers and white stone fruit. The palate is also subdued, suggesting mature peach before a bitter almond close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Ascevi Luwa 2018 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Banana and elderflower aromas leap to the forefront. The banana note follows on the tangy palate along with green apple and tangy acidity. It's simple but well-made.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Villa Girardi 2019 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: This simple white has a shy nose offering whiffs of spring flowers and white stone fruit. It's bright and informal, offering suggestions of green apple and citrus alongside brisk acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Tommasi 2019 Le Rosse Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Appellation: Santa Cruz Mountains, Central Coast, California, US
Description: Very tight on the nose, this bottling, which features an old-timey label from the family's deep history, offers tangerine and Meyer lemon pith on the nose along with a light brush of white flower and lime blossom. The palate produces wet stone flavors against nectarine, honeysuckle and a strong pink-grapefruit citrus element.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Bargetto 2018 Regan Vineyards Pinot Grigio (Santa Cruz Mountains)

Appellation: Monterey County, Central Coast, California, US
Description: Candied green apple, honeydew and hints of jasmine show on the nose of this bottling. The palate offers green touches of cut lawn and Granny Smith apple, but there is also a riper hint of red apple.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Noble Vines 2019 152 Pinot Grigio (Monterey County)

Description: Don't be put off by the box format. Floral aromas and ripe melon and citrus flavors dominate this enjoyable, medium- to full-bodied wine. It feels nicely round and mouthfilling in texture.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Kirkland Signature 2019 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: A light shade of pink, this bottling begins with tightly wound aromas of brisk lemon spray and wet soil. It's refreshing on the palate with citrus peel and a slight pear flavor.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Maddalena 2019 Pinot Grigio (Monterey)

Description: Aromas of white peach and citrus blossom lead to flavors of apricot, yellow peach and apple in the palate. It has good mouthfeel and the finish is soft and fruity.                      Jeff Jenssen
Name: Cramele Recas 2019 Legendary Estate Series Pinot Grigio (Transylvania)

Description: This wine is clean and lean, offering light herb and crisp apple flavors on a light body. It provides good, simple refreshment.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Cliche 2019 Hybrid Pinot Grigio (Lodi)

Description: This medium-bodied wine is almost neutral in flavor: nothing to dislike but not much to appreciate. It has reasonable acidity and freshness and very simple, crisp apple flavors.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Harthill Farms NV Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: This Pinot Grigio is straw colored, with aromas of apple blossom and lemon pith. It is light bodied, with flavors of Bartlett pear, grapefruit and pineapple. The finish has a touch of fruit sweetness.                      Jeff Jenssen
Name: Cramele Recas 2019 Paparuda Estate Selection Pinot Grigio (Romania)

Appellation: Columbia Valley (WA), Columbia Valley, Washington, US
Description: Light aromas of green and yellow apple and Oregon pear lead to a dry, flavorful palate etched with lively acidity that draws out the finish. There's a whole lot to like.                      Sean P. Sullivan
Name: Milbrandt 2019 Pinot Grigio (Columbia Valley (WA))

Description: A green apple aroma follows over to the fresh palate along with green melon and a hint of white almond. Tangy acidity keeps it lively.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Confetti! 2019 Pinot Grigio (Valdadige)

Description: This copper-colored Pinot Grigio has delicate aromas of banana and yellow stone fruit. On the fresh palate, tangy acidity lifts yellow peach and a hint of red berry.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Albino Armani 2018 Terradeiforti Colle¬†Ara Pinot Grigio (Valdadige)

Description: Honeysuckle and banana aromas lead the nose. The banana note carries over to the palate along with hints of pineapple and tangy acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Albino Armani 2019 Corvara Pinot Grigio (Valdadige)

Description: An effusive rose aroma melds with red berry and a suggestion of fresh mint on the nose. The palate offers bruised apple, tart grapefruit, golden raspberry and wildflowers. There is a chalky feeling, and acidity weaves between tart and juicy, finishing with chalk and ruby grapefruit.                      Fiona Adams
Name: Cask Three Oh Seven 2018 Ros√© of Pinot Grigio (Grand River Valley)

Description: Light bodied and diluted, this has subdued sensations recalling pear and citrus. It's bright, with crisp acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Il Casato 2019 Pinot Grigio (Valdadige)

Appellation: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Spring blossom and ripe white stone fruit mingle with a whiff of cantaloupe on this delicious white. The aromas carry over to the round, full-bodied palate along with nutmeg and white almond. Tangy acidity lifts the rich flavors.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Kofererhof 2018 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)

Description: Crisp and elegantly structured, this fragrant white has enticing scents of elderflower, white stone fruit and Alpine herb. On the savory palate, notes of ginger and a hint of cedar back up juicy yellow pear, white peach and lemon drop before finishing on a fennel note.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Castel Firmian 2018 Riserva Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: Hawthorn, white stone-fruit and bread-dough aromas mingle with whiffs of Alpine herb and hazelnut on this elegant white. The polished palate delivers creamy white peach, ripe yellow pear, almond and citrus zest before finishing on a honeyed note. Fresh acidity brightens the rich flavors.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Mezzacorona 2016 Musivum Vicina Pinot Grigio (Trentino Superiore)

Appellation: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Aromas of green apple, pear and citrus follow over to the savory palate along with green melon, ginger and tangerine zest. It's bright and delicious, with tangy acidity before a fresh, clean close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Abbazia di Novacella 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)

Description: Acacia-flower, white stone-fruit and citrusy aromas waft out of the glass. On the full-bodied palate, hints of ginger accent yellow pear, white peach and lemon zest before a hint of white almond. Tangy acidity lifts the rich flavors.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Nals Margreid 2018 Punggl Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: This structured white opens with delicate scents of beeswax, white stone fruit and chamomile flower. On the round, medium-bodied palate, notes of honeyed almond accent yellow pear and creamy white peach.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Cantina Kurtatsch 2018 Penoner Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Appellation: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Aromas of honeysuckle, green apple and honeydew melon follow through to the juicy palate, along with a note of white peach. Tangy acidity lifts the rich flavors.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Tiefenbrunner 2019 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)

Description: This structured, delicious white shows Pinot Grigio's serious side, delivering juicy flavors of ripe yellow pear, apple, creamy peach and fennel. Tangy acidity and saline-like mineral notes and lemon thyme linger on the finish.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Nals Margreid 2018 Hill Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Subtle aromas evoking honeydew melon, white stone fruit and Alpine wild flower shape the delicate nose. Round and medium bodied, the palate offers ripe yellow pear, white almond and tangy mineral before closing on a fennel note.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Elena Walch 2018 Vigna Castel Ringberg Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Aged for seven months in large oak casks, this full-bodied white has aromas suggesting white stone fruit, coconut and a whiff of coffee bean. The aromas follow through to the rounded palate, along with fruity sensations of apricot and yellow apple.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Tiefenbrunner 2018 Turmhof Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Crisp, clean and linear, this snappy, savory white features white-spring-flower, ripe pear and lemon-zest sensations. Bright acidity and tangy saline notes give it a racy edge and a pristine finish.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Alois Lageder 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Crisp and refreshing, this bright wine opens with aromas of white stone fruit, spring blossom and beeswax. On the tangy, linear palate, vibrant acidity lifts ripe yellow apple, Bartlett pear and a hint of tangy saline.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Infin√© 1939 2018 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Appellation: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Fermented and aged partly in large casks and partly in barrique, this full-bodied white has aromas and flavors of oak, coconut and cedar. It closes on a bitter-almond note.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Abbazia di Novacella 2018 Praepositus Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)

Description: Aromas of hazelnut, beeswax and honey follow on the medium-bodied palate along with apple, citrus and a hint of mineral. Crisp acidity keeps if fresh and lively.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Alois Lageder 2018 Porer Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Green apple, elderflower and citrus aromas form the nose. The fruity sensations carry over to the medium-bodied palate along with creamy yellow pear and orange zest before a bright, tangy close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Erste Neue 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Appellation: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Showing the serious side of Pinot Grigio, this offers alluring aromas of elderflower, white stone fruit and crushed Alpine herb. The crisp savory palate delivers ripe pear and Meyer lemon alongside lively acidity and a hint of saline.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Pacher Hof 2018 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)

Description: This offers heady scents of spring blossom, white stone fruit and a whiff of crushed mint. Reflecting the nose, the crisp palate offers Anjou pear, honeydew melon and a hint of Alpine herb.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Kupelwieser 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of ripe pear and green apple carry over to the palate, along with hints of saline and bitter almond. Tangy acidity gives it a juicy finish.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Peter Zemmer 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: This offers delicate scents of white wild flower and honeydew melon while the tangy palate shows pear, lemon drop and a hint of cantaloupe. Fresh acidity gives it a crisp, clean finish.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Cantina Tramin 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Green-apple and citrus aromas follow through to the bright palate along with notes of Alpine herb and green melon. It's fresh, with tangy acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Colterenzio 2018 Puiten Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Appellation: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Spring blossom and white stone-fruit aromas mingle together on this fresh, savory white. The light-bodied, rounded palate delivers white peach, juicy pear and a hint of Alpine fennel alongside tangy acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Franz Haas 2018 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)

Description: This has delicate aromas suggesting spring blossom and white stone fruit. On the light-bodied palate, fresh acidity accompanies yellow pear and ripe apple.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Elena Walch 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Appellation: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy
Description: Aromas of almond and red apple carry the nose of this Pinot Grigio that spent up to 12 hours on its skins after crush. Citrus and apple peel flavors are honed by slight melon-rind and almond tones on the palate, with lifted acidity lending support to the creamy frame.                      Alexander Peartree
Name: Novaripa 2018 Monatic Amber Pinot Grigio (Terre di Chieti)

Description: The aromas are pleasing, with notes of pear, crushed flower and apple. Dry, even flavors follow. A lovely sense of acidity ties it together.                      Sean P. Sullivan
Name: Beauty in Chaos 2018 Pinot Grigio (Washington)

Appellation: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: White stone-fruit and spring-blossom aromas waft out of the glass. On the bright palate, tangy acidity lifts ripe yellow pear and mature apple.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Bollini 2019 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)

Appellation: Russian River Valley, Sonoma, California, US
Description: Entirely stainless-steel fermented and aged, this lively white wine has wide appeal in its sweet floral nose and layers of vanilla and peach. Expressive, textured and bright, it is well made.                      Virginie Boone
Name: Ferrari-Carano 2019 Pinot Grigio (Russian River Valley)

Description: The wine has a shy nose that eventually suggests crushed stone and Bartlett pear. On the linear palate, tangy acidity accompanies ripe yellow apple, lemon thyme and a hint of dried chamomile.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: St. Pauls 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Aged in large cask and tonneaux, this has aromas of beeswax, cedar and toasted nut. On the round, full-bodied palate, bright acidity lifts butterscotch, pear and honeyed notes before a coffee-bean close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Tramin 2018 Unterebner Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: One of the best value whites coming out of Italy, this enjoyable wine has aromas of spring blossom and white stone fruit. Crisp and savory, the fresh palate offers yellow pear and juicy citrus before a hint of white almond signals the close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Mezzacorona 2019 Estate Bottled Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: Aromas of green apple and pear march over to the tangy palate along, with a hint of Meyer lemon. Crisp acidity lifts the fruity flavors.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Bottega Vinaia 2019 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: This full-bodied wine is vibrant and structured, showing a spicy, earthy influence in addition to clean and crisp apple and Bosc pear flavors. The texture has a little bite that's appetizing. No added sulfites.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Frey 2018 Organic Pinot Grigio (Mendocino)

Description: Crisp and medium-bodied, this refreshing white has pretty aromas of white spring flower and pear. The tangy palate offers ripe apple, white peach and a citrusy note alongside vibrant acidity before an almond close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Kellerei Kaltern Caldaro 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Appellation: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Aromas of toasted nut, oak and coconut lead the nose along with a whiff of white stone fruit. The racy palate is on the lean side, evoking yellow apple, bitter almond and hints of butterscotch alongside brisk acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Maso Cantaghel 2018 Maso Papa Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)

Appellation: South Eastern Australia, Australia Other, Australia
Description: This is a fruity Pinot Grigio that leads with lime, pineapple rind, lychee and honeysuckle. It's a little on the candied side, but plenty will find it appealing. Acidity on the palate is crisp and bright, buoying a creamy, fruity mouthfeel. A bitter melon-rind note shows on the finish.                      Christina Pickard
Name: Yellow Tail 2019 Pinot Grigio (South Eastern Australia)

Description: Anjou pear aromas follow over to the straightforward tangy palate, along with notes of green apple and citrus. Bright acidity keeps it fresh.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Girlan 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: This has a subdued nose that eventually reveals whiffs of pressed chamomile flower toasted hazelnut. The palate is shy in terms of fruit richness, suggesting bitter almond and lemon zest alongside brisk acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Kellerei Kaltern Caldaro 2018 Soll Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: French oak, butterscotch and coconut aromas dominate the nose. The flavors follow through to the firm, full-bodied along with cedar, vanilla and coffee bean but it lacks fruit richness.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Peter Zemmer 2017 Giati Riserva Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Appellation: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: This has fruity aromas of honeydew melon and green apple. The aromas follow through to the light, easygoing palate along with a hint of peach and crisp acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Alta Luna 2019 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)

Appellation: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: This opens with delicate scents of spring blossom and red berry, and (thanks to brief maceration of the grape skins in the must) a pretty copper color. On the palate, tangy acidity accompanies peach and pomegranate before a saline close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Casata Monfort 2019 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)

Description: The rather shy nose evokes spring wildflower and white stone fruit. On the crisp palate, vibrant acidity accompanies suggestions of green apple and pear before a citrusy close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Kris 2019 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: Crisp and clean, this opens with delicate aromas of spring blossom and white stone fruit. On the vibrant palate, fresh acidity accompanies green apple and a hint of white peach.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Tolloy 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Fruity aromas of apple and pear follow over to the light-bodied palate, along with a hint of green melon. Tangy acidity gives it a bright finish.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Zenato 2019 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Appellation: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: This has delicate scents suggesting spring blossom and white stone fruit. On the tangy palate, fresh acidity accompanies white peach and green apple while the barest hint of almond marks the close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Castelfeder 2019 Mont M√®s Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)

Description: White stone-fruit and yellow wild-flower aromas form the delicate nose. On the refreshing palate, tangy acidity accompanies honeydew melon and ripe Bartlett pear.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Castel Firmian 2019 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: This wine is clean and refreshing, boasting modest but tasty peach and apple flavors on a fairly crisp texture. It's just what many people are looking for in this variety.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Line 39 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: A yellow-leaning tint and aromas of spiced apple open this Pinot Grigio that's citrusy and malic in feel. Citrus and apple flavors are more basic than complex, while the finish offers grip and pop.                      Michael Schachner
Name: Santa Julia 2019 [+] Pinot Grigio (Mendoza)

Description: Aromas of green apple follow over to the fresh palate along with green melon and a hint of white almond. Tangy acidity keeps it lively.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: La Vis 2019 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Appellation: South Eastern Australia, Australia Other, Australia
Description: This is a fruity wine that opens with heady notes of stone fruit, lime and florals. Acidity on the palate is lifted if a bit biting and forced. There are large helpings of fruit, too. A straightforward, easy sipper.                      Christina Pickard
Name: Bulletin Place 2018 Pinot Grigio (South Eastern Australia)

Description: This largely colorless Pinot Grigio smells floral and lightly candied, while the palate is fresh and modest. Sweet lime and tropical fruit flavors wrap up on a direct finish with medium acidity.                      Michael Schachner
Name: Argento 2018 Cool Climate Selection Pinot Grigio (Mendoza)

Description: The shy nose eventually releases delicate aromas of acacia flower and a whiff of white stone fruit. The bright easygoing palate offers yellow pear and a hint of green melon alongside bright acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Casata Monfort 2019 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: The nose is rather shy but eventually reveals whiffs of beeswax and toasted nut. The palate isn't very expressive, suggesting hints of yellow-apple skin and bitter almond.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Castel Sallegg 2018 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: This light-bodied wine is mild in flavor and well balanced, offering good refreshment and drinkability. Light melon and apple notes ride along with crisp acidity.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Bella Impavida 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: This easygoing white has delicate aromas evoking pear and apple. The aromas follow over to the light-bodied palate along with a hint of green melon.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Cantine di Ora 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: This wine has delicate aromas of spring blossom and white stone fruit. On the fresh, simple palate, crisp acidity accompanies Anjou pear and yellow apple.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Cavit 2019 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: Perfumed notes of stone fruit and ginger spice on the nose of this wine are appealing yet on the synthetic side. Likewise on the palate, which is slippery in texture, with slightly forced acidity.                      Christina Pickard
Name: Alpha Box & Dice 2019 Tarot Pinot Grigio (Adelaide Hills)

Description: Fresh and light-bodied, this tangy easygoing white has delicate flavors evoking apple and pear before a citrusy close. It's extremely simple but well made, with crisp acidity and would make a refreshing pour for large, informal gatherings.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Lagaria 2019 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: Lightly scented and light-bodied, this has subdued aromas suggesting honeydew melon and banana. The aromas carry over to the extremely simple palate, along with crisp acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Cembra 2019 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: Neutral aromas are low on fruit, while this feels a touch melony due to low acidity. Generic white fruit flavors hold their own on a controlled finish. Drink right away.                      Michael Schachner
Name: Graffigna 2019 Pinot Grigio (Argentina)

Description: Subtle aromas evoking crushed tomato vine and passion fruit lead the nose. The light, simple palate evokes pink grapefruit and white peach alongside crisp acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: La Vis 2019 Ros√© Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Appellation: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy
Description: Red apple, candied white flowers and fresh dill carry the nose. The palate is creamy in feel, but properly lifted by bright acidity. A savory nut tone marks the close.                      Alexander Peartree
Name: Citra 2018 Estate Grown Pinot Grigio (Terre di Chieti)

Description: Simple white fruit aromas open this direct Pinot Grigio. Citrusy flavors are bright and lively but short on depth, while basic citric notes of orange and tangerine drive a tart, lean finish.                      Michael Schachner
Name: Domaine Bousquet 2019 Made with Organic Grapes Pinot Grigio (Tupungato)

Description: A light straw color and neutral aromas don't give this many selling points upfront, while the palate is lean and citric in feel. Tart lemon and orange flavors fade quickly on a finish that's snappy before turning hollow.                      Michael Schachner
Name: Finca la Celia 2019 Reserva Pinot Grigio (Uco Valley)

Description: A fruity nose of ripe red apple, melon and candied banana starts off this straightforward Pinot Grigio. There's a ripe, almost mushy melon flavor to the palate, yet it still has ample lift from candied citrus and apple flavors.                      Alexander Peartree
Name: Cantina Zaccagnini 2019 Dal Tralcetto Pinot Grigio (Colline Pescaresi)

Description: This wine is ultrapale in color and mild in aroma. A palate with adequate acidity offers white fruit flavors and not much more.                      Michael Schachner
Name: Argento 2019 Cool Climate Selection Pinot Grigio (Mendoza)

Description: This wine has overripe aromas of baked grapes and honeycomb. It has a steely tone and is ultimately marred by sulfur.                      Virginie Boone
Name: Santori 2018 Pinot Grigio (Napa Valley)

Appellation: Santa Barbara County, Central Coast, California, US
Description: Hints of toast meet with orange rinds and yellow apples on the nose of this bottling by longtime Italian grape proponent Steve Clifton. There is a brisk energy to the sip, where yellow-grapefruit and pluot flavors are bright.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Palmina 2018 Pinot Grigio (Santa Barbara County)

Description: Tangy aromas of lime peel, grapefruit rind and pith show on the nose of this bottling. There is a pleasant stony grip to the sip, where peach flesh, coconut oil and a tart citrus flavors align.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Alara 2018 Van Ruiten Acampo Ranch Pinot Grigio (Lodi)

Appellation: San Luis Obispo, Central Coast, California, US
Description: Wet stone and cement aromas give mineral depth to the crisp yellow-grapefruit-pith touch on the nose of this bottling. That earthy cement kick shows on the sip as well, where strong acidity carries lemon-zest flavors.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Bianchi 2018 Pinot Grigio (San Luis Obispo)

Description: This wine starts out very closed and needs lots of swirling in glass before it starts to reveal subtle aromas of pear, orange peel and spice. The mouthfeel is slippery and fruity. A straightforward and appealing, if not overly exciting, drop.                      Christina Pickard
Name: Yalumba 2018 The Y Series Pinot Grigio (South Australia)

Description: Straw-colored in the glass, this Romanian Pinot Grigio has aromas of fresh white peach and canned apricots. In the mouth there are flavors of peach and papaya before the clean finish.                      Jeff Jenssen
Name: Cramele Recas 2018 Legendary Estate Series Pinot Grigio (Transylvania)

Description: Clean, fresh apple and peach flavors make this medium-bodied wine charming and appealing. It shows a nice balance between fruitiness and crisp acidity without being too lean.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Mirassou 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: This light-bodied wine is driven by acidity, showing crisp and lean citrus flavors and a rather tight, racy texture. Oysters on the half shell come immediately to mind.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: Very fruity and probably a touch sweet, this light-bodied wine sports peach and ripe apple flavors, a relatively crisp texture and clean finish.                      Jim Gordon
Name: California Roots 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: Straightforward melon flavors and a rich mouthfeel make this medium-bodied wine fruity in taste and rather broad in texture.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Luna 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: Fresh floral and peach aromas and ripe stone-fruit and apple flavors give this rather soft-textured and medium-bodied wine plenty of life.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Kirkland Signature 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)

Appellation: Friuli Colli Orientali, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Aromas of spring blossom and mature yellow apple waft out of the glass along with an inviting whiff of sun-warmed hay. On the rounded palate, a toasted almond note accents ripe Bartlett pear, honeydew melon and a tangy citrus note.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Volpe Pasini 2017 Zuc di Volpe Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)

Appellation: Columbia Valley (WA), Columbia Valley, Washington, US
Description: Inspired by the whites of northern Italy, this is a one-of-a-kind wine in the state: a cofermentation of Pinot Grigio, Sauvignon Blanc, Riesling and Moscato. Petroleum jelly, green apple, melon and a whiff of tropical fruit lead to bone-dry flavors that stretch out on the finish. A lively sense of acidity accents it all.                      Sean P. Sullivan
Name: Bieler Family 2018 Daisy Pinot Grigio (Columbia Valley (WA))

Appellation: Friuli Colli Orientali, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Hawthorn and ripe green-apple aromas mingle together on this medium-bodied white. On the round savory palate, tangy acidity lifts honeydew melon and ripe Bartlett pear before a fennel finish.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)

Appellation: Friuli Colli Orientali, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Aromas of white stone fruit, honeysuckle and a whiff of nut shape the nose. On the tangy medium-bodied palate, a saline note lifts peach, yellow pear and bitter almond.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Terlato 2018 Estate Bottled Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)

Appellation: Friuli Colli Orientali, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Aromas of white spring flower, wild herb and white stone fruit form the nose. Savory and rounded, the palate doles out ripe Bartlett pear, tangerine, white almond and a hint of saline alongside tangy acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Cantarutti 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)

Description: Straw colored in the glass, this Serbian Pinot Grigio has aromas of talcum powder, vanilla bean and white peach. It has a strong backbone of minerality, with flavors of white peach and apricot blossom in the mouth before a crisp, clean finish.                      Jeff Jenssen
Name: Zvonko Bogdan 2017 Pinot Grigio (Serbia)

Appellation: Friuli Colli Orientali, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Citrus-blossom and green-apple aromas form the nose, along with delicate whiffs of beeswax. Tangy and refreshing, the rounded light-bodied palate offers mature yellow pear, white peach and a hint of Meyer lemon.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Volpe Pasini 2018 Grivo Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)

Appellation: Friuli Colli Orientali, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Spring wild-flower and honeydew-melon aromas come together in the glass. On the juicy rounded palate, tangy acidity accompanies Granny Smith apple and yellow pear before an almond close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: La Tunella 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)

Description: Key lime pith, crisp rainwater and Pink Lady apple aromas show on the nose of this bottling. There is a fresh line of lime and green pear down the middle of the sip, which is simple but refreshing.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Maddalena 2018 Pinot Grigio (Monterey)

Appellation: Friuli Colli Orientali, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Medium bodied and structured, this has subtle aromas of mature yellow stone fruit, pressed wildflower and a whiff of hay. On the rounded palate, an almond note underscores ripe yellow apple and Bartlett pear.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: La Viarte 2017 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)

Appellation: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: This opens with aromas of toasted oak and mature yellow apple that carry over to the tangy palate along with a hint of bitter almond. Fresh acidity lifts the finish.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Maso Cantaghel 2017 Maso Papa Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)

Appellation: Friuli Colli Orientali, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Aromas of acacia flower and ripe yellow stone fruit form the nose. The bright medium-bodied palate offers peach, apricot and a hint of lemon zest alongside fresh acidity. A white-almond note announces the close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Conte d'Attimis-Maniago 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)

Appellation: Friuli Colli Orientali, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Aromas of green apple and almond follow over to the rounded palate along with a lemon-drop note. Bright acidity gives it a crisp tangy close.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Dorigo 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)

Appellation: Friuli Colli Orientali, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: This copper-colored wine opens with aromas of wild berry, toasted nut and graphite. Made with a few hours of skin contact, the palate offers sour cherry and bitter almond alongside tangy acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Dorigo 2018 Pinorigo Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)

Appellation: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Honeysuckle and Granny Smith apple aromas flow over to the tangy palate, along with yellow pear. It closes on a note of honeyed almond.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Castelfeder 2018 Mont M√®s Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)

Description: Fresh and fun, this offers aromas and flavors of Granny Smith apple and honeydew melon. The simple but well made palate is crisp and refreshing, with bright acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: La Vis 2018 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: This evokes aromas of toasted hazelnut, beeswax and mature yellow stone fruit. Reflecting the nose, the brawny palate shows dried apricot, toasted notes and bitter almond, while the warmth of evident alcohol throws it off balance. Drink now to capture the remaining fruit and freshness.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Castel Sallegg 2017 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Appellation: Friuli Colli Orientali, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: Aromas of Granny Smith apple follow over to the easygoing palate, along with a hint of honeydew melon. It's simple but well made, with tangy acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Torre Rosazza 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)

Appellation: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: This simple white has subdued aromas of white spring flower and green apple. On the palate, brisk acidity accompanies Anjou pear and hint of lemon zest.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Terre di Fohn 2018 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)

Description: Fresh lemon-lime aromas and tangy, green-apple flavors give this light-bodied wine an appealing fruity character. The smooth texture has a touch of crisp acidity for balance.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: This simple white has pungent aromas of over-mature orange rind and extremely ripe stone fruit. The aromas carry over to the brisk palate along with bitter almond and candied notes.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Cantine di Ora 2018 Il Casato Pinot Grigio (Valdadige)

Appellation: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy
Description: This informal white has subdued one-dimensional aromas suggesting bitter almond. On the extremely simple, diluted palate, you'll find the merest hint of green apple alongside crisp acidity.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Luna Nuda 2018 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)

Description: This wine smells gorgeously fruity, tastes ripe and pure like freshly cut apples and Bosc pears, and has a good crisp texture balanced by medium body. A touch of sweetness emerges on the finish.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Terra d'Oro 2018 Pinot Grigio (Clarksburg)

Appellation: Central Coast, Central Coast, California, US
Description: Broad aromas of Meyer lemon, lime balm and citrus blossoms show on the nose of this bottling. The palate is tightly wound, with fresh flashes of tangy apple.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)

Description: Big on fruit and floral flavors, this medium-bodied wine exudes crisp apple and Anjou pear aromas that lead to ripe fruit on the palate and a touch of tanginess on the finish.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)

Appellation: River Junction, Central Valley, California, US
Description: Tangy and crisp in character, this light-bodied wine shows touches of mineral and white pepper in the aromas, and lean citrus and green-apple flavors on the palate. It's refreshing and reserved.                      Jim Gordon
Name: McManis 2018 Estate Grown Certified Sustainable Pinot Grigio (River Junction)

Description: Citrus blossom and white stone fruit aromas lift out of the glass. On the easygoing palate, a hint of white almond accents green apple and Meyer lemon before a tangy finish.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Feudo Arancio 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)

Appellation: Russian River Valley, Sonoma, California, US
Description: Light and crisp, this wine offers peach, melon and stone. It remains bright and approachable from start to finish.                      Virginie Boone
Name: D & L Carinalli 2018 Estate Pinot Grigio (Russian River Valley)

Description: Aromas of spring flowers and green apple form the nose along with a whiff of Mediterranean herbs. On the tangy palate, bright acidity lifts ripe pear and white peach before a citrus finish.                      Kerin O‚ÄôKeefe
Name: Stemmari 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)

Description: This fruity and very affordable wine has an appealing, smooth texture and attractive, light peach and apple flavors. Medium body and a touch of crispness make it appetizing.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Barefoot NV Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: This is a light, lean wine that emphasizes simple refreshment and will be easy to sip. Delicate green-apple aromas and a touch of butter in the flavor give it just enough substance to savor.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Oak Grove 2018 Family Reserve Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: This wine is light, fruity and soft in texture, offering honeydew melon aromas and golden apple flavors. It's mild in terms of acidity and short on the finish.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Three Pears 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)

Appellation: South Eastern Australia, Australia Other, Australia
Description: Straw in color and smelling like freshly sliced pears and pineapples and white-flower blossoms, this straightforward Pinot Grigio offers bright acidity, a slippery texture and a juicy finish.                      Christina Pickard
Name: Bulletin Place 2017 Pinot Grigio (South Eastern Australia)

Description: Earthy in pea shoots and freshly cut grass, this is a thick, viscous and lemony white wine, restrained in ripeness and a lasting flavor of peach.                      Virginie Boone
Name: Benessere 2018 Pinot Grigio (Napa Valley)

Description: This light-bodied wine has a touch of wood smoke in the aroma and vague, modestly fruity flavors.                      Jim Gordon
Name: AVA Grace 2018 Citrus Pear Vibrant Pinot Grigio (California)

Description: Very basic in flavor, this canned wine is acceptable as a generic accompaniment to food. It's light bodied and soft in texture.                      Jim Gordon
Name: Dark Horse NV Pinot Grigio (California)
